xtc.lang.blink.agent
Class AgentVariable

java.lang.Object
  xtc.lang.blink.agent.AgentVariable

public class AgentVariable
extends Object

The Blink support for the convenience variables in the Java debugger. This class in particular represent a poly-morphic convenience variable to hold both the java primitive and the reference values.
